meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the conjugant under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The conjugant reacted with another chemical in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The curious conjugant decided to join the chemical reaction party.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chemistry, the conjugant is like a key player in a complex dance.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a model to explain how the conjugant interacts with other molecules.

meanings.definition: A member of a group of elements related by a conjugation operation.
meanings.sent1: The conjugant in the set followed a specific pattern.
meanings.sent2: Each conjugant in the series had a unique role.
meanings.sent3: The playful conjugant in the group always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The conjugant stood out like a bright star among the elements.
meanings.sent5: The artist arranged the elements like a beautiful bouquet, with each conjugant adding its own touch.
